meanings.definition: The action or process of installing something.
meanings.sent1: The installation of the new air conditioner was completed yesterday.
meanings.sent2: The installation of the playground equipment will begin next week.
meanings.sent3: The installation of the giant teddy bear in the park brought smiles to everyone's faces.
meanings.sent4: The installation of hope in their hearts was like a bright light in the darkness.
meanings.sent5: The installation of the new security system made the building feel safer and more secure.

meanings.definition: A formal ceremony or event to mark the beginning of a new role or position.
meanings.sent1: The installation of the new mayor was attended by many citizens.
meanings.sent2: The installation of the president will take place in the grand hall.
meanings.sent3: The installation of the office manager included a funny dance performance.
meanings.sent4: The installation of the queen was a majestic affair with music and flowers.
meanings.sent5: The installation of the principal was a proud moment for the school community.

meanings.definition: A piece of software that is installed on a computer or device.
meanings.sent1: The installation of the antivirus program was quick and easy.
meanings.sent2: The installation of the new app required a restart of the device.
meanings.sent3: The installation of the game made the computer much more fun to use.
meanings.sent4: The installation of the software was like adding a new tool to the toolbox.
meanings.sent5: The installation of the updates improved the performance of the device.
